body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! Thank you for contacting Apex Auto Solutions. My name is Juan Jenkins. May I please have your name?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hello, my name is Denise Garcia.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hi Denise, how can I assist you today? I see you are facing an issue with product quality.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, I recently purchased a car from your dealership and I've been having issues with the brakes.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'm sorry to hear that, Denise. Can you provide me with the vehicle's VIN number and the mileage on the odometer?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, the VIN is eight zero zero one two, and the mileage is three five zero zero zero.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for that information. We will look into this matter and get back to you with a resolution as soon as possible.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Denise! Thank you for reaching out to us. We will prioritize resolving this issue for you. Have a great day!
